isFree.question: Is Magic Invoice free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes, Magic Invoice is completely free to use. You can create unlimited invoices without any cost.

accountRequired.question: Do I need to create an account?
accountRequired.answer: No, you can create and download invoices instantly without signing up. Your data stays on your device.

customize.question: Can I customize the invoice design?
customize.answer: Yes, you can add your logo, change colors, and adjust the layout to match your brand identity.

dataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecure.answer: Absolutely. We don't store your invoice data on our servers. Everything is processed locally in your browser.
